title: What is the best tool on using a cell phone for surveys in a classroom? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are looking to create surveys that can be taken on any type of device, I would like to suggest ClassMarker. They have a user-friendly interface on a secure and stable platform. For Education users, they offer a free plan and discounted professional plans if wanting to upgrade, to assist those using the platform for Education. The ClassMarker system does work on all devices, such as PC, Mac, iPhone, iPad, Chrome Book, all smart devices. Your users can take surveys anywhere, anytime on any device. Online Quiz Maker Features

Hi! Check MySurveyLab. It works great eather on cell phones, PCs or tablets. It enables you to make surveys as well as test of knowledge with marks in the end.  The tool is easy-to-use and it has really a lot of useful functions. It has about 20 types of questions and ability to add images to all of them. You can also use a mobile app, which enables you to gather responses even offline. As you can see, branding list of options is also wide. You are able to chose colors, fonts, background and etc. The pricing is really affordable. You can check it here: What is price for good research?  If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to ask. Hope to be helpful! Good luck!
